DOC.brief_summary: This is a single center, randomized, blinded, placebo-controlled, two-period, cross-over study to evaluate the effect of pramlintide on satiety and food intake in normal-weight and obese non-diabetic subjects and in insulin-treated subjects with type 1 and type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Effect of Pramlintide on Satiety and Food Intake
